```{r include = FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(data.table)
load('RawData.rda')
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

inputPanel(
  selectInput("Column_Index", label = "Index of Attribute",
              choices = colnames(Raw_Train), selected = "V_product_type")
)

renderPlot({

  column = input$Column_Index
  data = Raw_Train
  p<-ggplot(data, aes(x = eval(parse(text = column)), y = V_price_doc)) +
     geom_smooth() +
     geom_bar(stat="summary",fun.y="mean") +
     xlab(column)+ylab("Sale Price")
  p
  
})

renderPrint({
  column = input$Column_Index
 print (Dict[Variable == column, Meaning])
 summary(Raw_Train[,eval(parse(text = column))])

})
```
